results.text: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
results.reason: Jesus offers rest to the tired and burdened.
results.reflection: Find true rest in Jesus amidst weariness.

results.text: but those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
results.reason: God promises renewed strength to those who trust in Him.
results.reflection: Hope in the Lord for strength to overcome weariness.

results.text: Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
results.reason: Encouragement to persevere and not grow weary in doing good.
results.reflection: Persist in doing good, for there is a reward in due time.

results.text: Consider him who endured such opposition from sinners, so that you will not grow weary and lose heart.
results.reason: Encouragement to look to Jesus and not grow weary in faith.
results.reflection: Draw strength from Jesus to endure challenges without losing heart.
